marighellas-history:
That's all folks.
I'm a proudly random-bred cat that are so active and frisky.
I was found in the mangrove when I was a baby.
I was abandoned, bruised, scared and undernourished.
Nowadays I have a good life and I'm always playing and discovering new things in my new home.
I feel like a real Richie Rich LOL.
